text: Cross-section of a monocot root. Note the lack of any pattern in the arrangement of the vascular bundles. This page's list covers the monocotyledon plants found in Great Britain and Ireland. This clade includes grasses, lilies, orchids, irises and a wide variety of aquatic plants. Status key: * indicates an introduced species and e indicates an extinct species. ==Order Alismatales (alismatids)== ===Family Butomaceae (flowering-rushes)=== {| class="wikitable" | |- !
